name: Full Service Shop
description:
It is the year 20XX, and the needs of every single person you know are being exceeded.

Your top-notch, free healthcare includes cyborg parts. Everyone's does.

And you're due for an upgrade.

Full Service Shop will be a NSFW visual novel about a kinky, futuristic health clinic where lesbian and sapphic humans and cyborgs can switch out their naughty bits. It will include a cast of about four technicians, each happy to share their kinks with you! It's being written right now for NaNoRenO, and will be out on April first.  (No foolin'!)

Confirmed Technicians:


Playful, sneaky, and a bit of a wildcard, Dr. Dea  "Exit" DeLus is always up for an inspection of an interesting model, and your parts are just TOO fascinating not to have a look at!

Once leading in the field of neurorobotics, Dr. Maya Kato has a bit of a dark reputation as a mad scientist. Nowadays, cyborgs are common, and time has vindicated her research, if not her reputation.

This is an 18+ game, and not intended to be a portrayal of SSC/RACK sex. If you're ever going to restrain a partner or assume sexual control, use a safe word and restraints that allow for proper circulation. Check the "Content Warnings" file in the game download for trigger warnings. Please consume your erotica responsibly, you kinky marvels.
